quest: The Prime Minister cannot be changed until the next General election
quest_zh: 總理直到下一次大選才能改變

quest: Which TWO things happened when Mary Stuart's husband got murdered?
quest_zh: 瑪麗·斯圖爾特（Mary Stuart）的丈夫被謀殺時發生了哪兩件事？

answers.answer: She gave her throne to Elizabeth I
answers.answer_zh: 她把她的寶座帶到了伊麗莎白

answers.answer: She was suspected of involvement in the murder
She asked Elizabeth I for help
answers.answer_zh: 她向伊麗莎白我尋求幫助

quest: In what year was there a revolution in France which led to a war with Britain?
quest_zh: 在哪一年，法國發生了一場革命，導致與英國發生戰爭？

quest: David Hockney was an important contributor to the 'pop art' movement of the 1960s
quest_zh: 大衛·霍克尼（David Hockney）是1960年代“波普藝術”運動的重要貢獻者

quest: Which of these is correct in the chronological order?
quest_zh: 按時間順序排列的哪個是正確的？

answers.answer: the Black Death, Magna Carta, Canterbury Tales
answers.answer_zh: 黑人死亡，瑪格娜·卡塔（Magna Carta），坎特伯雷故事

answers.answer: the Black Death, Canterbury Tales, Magna Carta
answers.answer_zh: 黑人死亡，坎特伯雷故事，瑪格娜·卡塔（Magna Carta）

answers.answer: Magna Carta, the Black Death, Canterbury Tales,
answers.answer_zh: 瑪格娜·卡塔（Magna Carta），黑人死亡，坎特伯雷（Canterbury）的故事，

answers.answer: Canterbury Tales, the Black Death, Magna Carta
answers.answer_zh: 坎特伯雷故事，黑人死亡，大憲章

quest: In 1998, what was the estimated population of the UK?
quest_zh: 1998年，英國的估計人口是多少？

quest: George Frederick wrote which oratorio, which is sung regularly by choirs, often at Easter time?
quest_zh: 喬治·弗雷德里克（George Frederick）經常在復活節時寫出哪個演說家，哪個演說家經常被合唱團演唱？

quest: The 39 steps was directed by David Lean in 1980
quest_zh: 這39個步驟是由David Lean指導的1980年

quest: Which TWO describe the Wimbledon Championships?
quest_zh: 哪兩個描述了溫網冠軍？

answers.answer: only "Grand Slam" event played on grass
answers.answer_zh: 唯一在草地上播放的“大滿貫”活動

answers.answer: only tennis tournament that Andy Murray won
answers.answer_zh: 安迪·默里（Andy Murray）只有網球錦標賽獲勝

answers.answer: only "Major" tournament held outside the US
answers.answer_zh: 僅在美國以外舉行的唯一的“大型”錦標賽

answers.answer: oldest tennis tournament in the world
answers.answer_zh: 世界上最古老的網球錦標賽

quest: Who captained the English cricket team and holds a number of records, both for batting and bowling?
quest_zh: 誰在擊球和保齡球比賽中擔任英國板球隊並保持許多記錄？

quest: Who was Thomas Gainsborough?
quest_zh: 誰是托馬斯·蓋恩斯伯勒（Thomas Gainsborough）？

answers.answer: Painted pictures on religious or literary themes in bright colours
answers.answer_zh: 以鮮豔的色彩上的宗教或文學主題的繪畫圖片

answers.answer: Was a portrait painter who often painted people in country or garden scenery
answers.answer_zh: 是一位肖像畫家，經常在鄉村或花園風景中畫畫

answers.answer: Was a landscape painter in modern style
answers.answer_zh: 是現代風格的景觀畫家

answers.answer: Is best known for his large bronze abstract sculptures
answers.answer_zh: 以他的大銅抽象雕塑而聞名

quest: Which TWO are facts about King William II of Scotland?
quest_zh: 關於蘇格蘭國王威廉二世國王的事實是哪兩個？

answers.answer: He was defeated by King James II of England when the latter tried to take back the crown
answers.answer_zh: 當後者試圖奪回王冠時，他被英格蘭國王擊敗

answers.answer: He was married to the young daughter of King James II of England, Wales and Ireland
answers.answer_zh: 他嫁給了英格蘭，威爾士和愛爾蘭國王詹姆斯二世的小女兒

answers.answer: He was the Protestant rule of the Netherlands before he became King William II of Scotland
answers.answer_zh: 在他成為蘇格蘭國王威廉二世之前，他是荷蘭的新教統治

answers.answer: He was William of Orange before he became King William III of England. Wales and Ireland
answers.answer_zh: 在成為英格蘭國王威廉三世之前，他是奧蘭治的威廉。威爾士和愛爾蘭

quest: Which TWO are notable British artists?
quest_zh: 兩位著名的英國藝術家？

answers.answer_zh: 馬修·哈里斯·喬伊特（Matthew Harris Jouett）

quest: Which TWO are correct about Mary Stuart?
quest_zh: 瑪麗·斯圖爾特（Mary Stuart）對哪兩個是正確的？

answers.answer: She was only a week old when she became queen
answers.answer_zh: 當她成為女王時，她只有一個星期

answers.answer: She spent much of her childhood in France
answers.answer_zh: 她的童年大部分時間都在法國度過
她是伊麗莎白我的妹妹

answers.answer: She died of the Black Death

quest: When King Charles I tried to impose a revised Prayer Book on the Presbyterian Church in Scotland, which TWO events occurred?
quest_zh: 當查爾斯國王試圖在蘇格蘭的長老會教堂上施加一本修訂的祈禱書，發生了兩次事件？

answers.answer: A Scottish army was formed and it invaded England
answers.answer_zh: 一支蘇格蘭軍隊成立，入侵英格蘭

answers.answer: King Charles I formed his own army without asking for help from Parliament
answers.answer_zh: 查爾斯國王一世國王組成了自己的軍隊，而無需向議會尋求幫助

answers.answer: Parliament only gave the money to King Charles when the Scottish army invaded England
answers.answer_zh: 蘇格蘭軍隊入侵英格蘭時，議會只給查爾斯國王

answers.answer: King Charles I recalled Parliament to ask it for funds to form his own army
answers.answer_zh: 查爾斯國王我召回議會要求其組成自己的軍隊

quest: Which TWO are famous British sailors?
quest_zh: 哪兩個是著名的英國水手？

answers.answer_zh: 弗朗西斯·奇切斯特爵士
羅賓·諾克斯·約翰斯頓爵士

quest: The EU was set up by 6 western countries who signed the Treaty of Rome on which date?
quest_zh: 歐盟是由6個西方國家建立的，他們在哪個日期簽署了羅馬條約？

quest: Which pair won gold medals for Ice dancing at the Olympic Games in 1984 and in four consecutive world championships?
quest_zh: 哪一對在1984年的奧運會和連續四個世界冠軍賽中贏得了冰舞的金牌？

answers.answer_zh: 傑恩·托維爾（Jayne Torvill）和克里斯托弗·迪恩（Christopher Dean）
詹妮弗·尼克斯和約翰·尼克斯
讓·韋斯特伍德和勞倫斯·德米
多琳·丹尼（Doreen Denny）和考特尼·瓊斯（Courtney Jones）

quest: Which of the following is a fundamental principle of British life?
quest_zh: 以下哪項是英國生活的基本原則？

quest: Which TWO are correct about King Henry's wives?
quest_zh: 亨利國王的妻子哪兩個是正確的？

answers.answer: Two of the wives were sisters

quest: Who was the British scientist who was awarded the Nobel prize for the discovery of the structure of the DNA molecule?
quest_zh: 誰是對DNA分子的結構而被授予諾貝爾獎的英國科學家？

quest: Ralph Vaughan Williams was strongly influenced by traditional English folk music
quest_zh: 拉爾夫·沃恩·威廉姆斯（Ralph Vaughan Williams）受到傳統英國民間音樂的強烈影響

quest: Which of these is a British invention/discovery?
quest_zh: 其中哪一個是英國的發明/發現？

answers.answer: The structure of the DNA molecule

quest: Which stories are associated with Geoffrey Chaucer?
quest_zh: 哪些故事與Geoffrey Chaucer有關？
